class.name: Noise
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for noise generators.
class.description: This class defines the interface for noise generation libraries to inherit from. A default get_seamless_noise() implementation is provided for libraries that do not provide seamless noise. This function requests a 10% larger image from get_image(), reverses the quadrants of the image, then uses the strips of extra width to blend over the seams. Inheriting noise classes can optionally override this function to provide a more optimal algorithm.
